error.signature: Job was active longer than specified deadline: DeadlineExceeded
error.regex: DeadlineExceeded|Job was active longer than specified deadline|activeDeadlineSeconds

verdict.summary: Kubernetes Job exceeded its activeDeadlineSeconds limit and was terminated. The job took longer than expected or the deadline is too short.

dead_ends.why_fails: Jobs may run indefinitely and consume cluster resources without bound

dead_ends.action: Set backoffLimit to a very high number
dead_ends.why_fails: backoffLimit controls retries, not the deadline — job will still be killed at the deadline

workarounds.action: Increase activeDeadlineSeconds to a realistic value based on actual job duration
workarounds.how: Profile the job's actual runtime and set deadline to 2-3x that value

workarounds.action: Optimize the job to complete faster — check for resource constraints or slow dependencies
workarounds.how: Increase CPU/memory requests, parallelize with spec.parallelism, or fix slow database queries

leads_to.condition: when replacing Job with a Deployment that keeps crashing

preceded_by.condition: when job pod was pending for too long eating into the deadline

frequently_confused_with.distinction: DeadlineExceeded is the Job controller killing the job, while pod-terminating-stuck is a pod that won't terminate gracefully
